extensionDescription.message: Brings a conversation view to a Thunderbird near you!

options.expand_who.description: Options - label for which messages should be expanded.

options.expand_auto.description: Options - label for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_auto.tooltip.message: If the thread is collapsed, expand all unread messages or the last message. If it is expanded, only expand the selected message in the message list.
options.expand_auto.tooltip.description: Options - tooltip for automatically expanding messages.

options.expand_none.description: Options - label for not expanding messages.

options.expand_all.description: Options - label for expanding all messages.

options.quoting_desc.message: Citati duži od ovog broja linija bit će sažeti.

options.hide_sigs_desc.message: Hoće li potpisi biti sakriveni prema zadanim postavkama.

options.friendly_date_title.description: Options - title for if to show friendly dates.

options.friendly_date_desc.message: U gornjem desnom kutu koristi "normalne" datume, kao u popisu poruka, umjesto "jučer" i sličnog.
options.friendly_date_desc.description: Options - description for if to show friendly dates.

options.tweak_chrome_title.description: Options - title for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_chrome_desc.message: Scale down the font size for the conversation chrome (recommended, requires restart).
options.tweak_chrome_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking chrome fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_title.description: Options - title for tweaking message body fonts.

options.tweak_bodies_desc.message: Tweak the fonts in the message bodies to make them consistent with the outer font (recommended, requires restart).
options.tweak_bodies_desc.description: Options - description for tweaking message body fonts.

options.operate_on_conversations_desc.message: Tipke alatne trake trebaju arhivirati i brisati cijeli razgovor, ne samo odabrane poruke.

options.extra_attachments_desc.message: In some corner cases, Thunderbird will fail to recognize some attachments. This option allows you to workaround the Thunderbird bug, and makes sure we try to display as many attachments as we can. Use in combination with the Show All Body Parts addon.

options.compose_in_tab_title.description: Options - title for hidden compose window enabling.

options.compose_in_tab_desc.message: Ctrl-Shift-N otvara sakriveni, nepodržati prozor za stvaranje u novoj kartici
options.compose_in_tab_desc.description: Options - description for hidden compose window enabling.

options.debugging_desc.message: Enable debug output in the system console and the error console. This will generate a lot of messages.

assistant.title.description: The document title of the assistant page.

assistant.p1.message: Kako bismo Vam olakšali stvari, čarobnjak će prilagoditi Vaše postavke za Thunderbird kako bismo osigurali optimalno iskustvo. Ne želimo da se osjećate nezadovoljno!
assistant.p1.description: First detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p2.message: Ne brinite, sve prilagodbe koje smo napravili mogu se vratiti. Ukoliko nećete uživati u Thunderbird Conversations vratit ćemo sve postavke na početne vrijednosti čim uklonite dodatak.
assistant.p2.description: Second detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.p3.message: Ovo može potrajati. Možete pričekati da se ovaj prozor zatvori ili možete ga sami zatvoriti i pratiti napredak iz izbornika Alati > Upravitelj aktivnostima.
assistant.p3.description: Third detail paragraph for the assistant.

assistant.working.description: An indication that the assistant is working.

assistant.review.description: The review button title for the assistant.

assistant.apply.description: The apply button title for the assistant.

assistant.settings.description: The settings section legend for the assistant.

assistant.actionEnableGloda.message: Provjerite je li globalno pretraživanje i indeksiranje uključeno.

assistant.actionDontExpand.message: U popisu poruka ne proširuj teme koje sadrže nepročitane poruke.
assistant.actionDontExpand.description: Option text for not expanding message threads.

assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.message: Ne prikazuj privitke unutar tijela poruke (izrazito preporučeno).
assistant.actionAttachmentsInline.description: Option text for showing attachments inline.

assistant.actionOfflineDownload.message: Primljena pošta i Poslano sinkronizira se za izvanmrežnu pohranu (izrazito preporučeno).
assistant.actionOfflineDownload.description: Option text for allowing offline download.

assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.message: Zajednička Primljena pošta također pretražuje mape Poslano (izrazito preporučeno).
assistant.actionUnifiedInboxSearchesSent.description: Option text for adding sent to the unified inbox.

assistant.actionSetupView.message: Prebacite se na Globalnu primljenu poštu, sortirajte po datumu, omogućite stupac za brojanje nepročitanih poruka i novi stupac "između" (izrazito preporučeno).
assistant.actionSetupView.description: Option text for how the view is set.

assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.message: Koristi ove prilagođene postavke za sortiranje za sve mape.
assistant.actionSetupViewDefaults.description: Option text for setting the view defaults.

assistant.actionEnsureMessagePaneVisible.message: Provjerite je li okno poruka vidljivo.
assistant.actionEnsureMessagePaneVisible.description: Option text for ensuring the message pane is visible.

assistant.settings2.message: Ukoliko želite promijeniti neke postavke kasnije, možete pristupiti ovom čarobnjaku kroz postavke dodatka, pod odjeljkom "Napredno".
assistant.settings2.description: Paragraph informing users of the ability to change settings later.

gallery.messageMovedOrDeleted.message: Ne možemo prikazati ovu galeriju jer su poruke premještene ili obrisane.
gallery.messageMovedOrDeleted.description: Message displayed if the email that the gallery is trying to view cannot be found.

gallery.title.description: The tab title for the image gallery

options.start_setup_assistant.description: Title of the button to open the setup assistant.

message.movedOrDeletedConversation.message: Ne možemo prikazati ovaj razgovor jer su poruke premještene ili obrisane.
message.movedOrDeletedConversation.description: Error message for the conversation tab

contact.copyEmailTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the copy email to clipboard button

contact.createFilterTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the create filter for contact button

contact.addContactTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the add contact button

contact.editContactTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the edit contact button

contact.sendEmailTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the send email button

contact.recentConversationsTooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the recent conversations button

message.archive.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the archive button in the conversation header

message.detach.tooltip.message: Prikaži ovaj razgovor u novoj kartici
message.detach.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the detach to new tab button in the conversation header

message.expand.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the expand button in the conversation header

message.forwardConversation.description: The link text for forwarding a conversation

message.junk.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the junk button in the conversation header

message.loading.description: Displayed when the message is loading

message.printConversation.description: The link text for printing a conversation

message.read.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the mark as read button in the conversation header

message.trash.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the trash button in the conversation header

message.noSubject.description: Displayed when a message has no subject

message.showDetails.tooltip.description: Tooltip for showing message header details

message.hideDetails.tooltip.description: Tooltip for hiding message header details

action.archive.description: Archive button name in the message more menu

action.delete.description: Delete button name in the message more menu

action.viewClassic.description: Show in classic view button name in the message more menu

action.viewSource.description: View source button name in the message more menu

notification.scamMsg.description: Notification message shown for a junk/scam message

notification.ignoreScamWarning.description: Button title to ignore a junk/scam message

notification.junkMsg.description: Notification message shown for junk messages

notification.notJunk.description: Button title to mark as not junk

notification.isOutboxMsg.description: Notification message shown for a message in the outbox

notification.sendUnsent.description: Button title to send a message in the outbox

notification.remoteContentBlockedMsg.description: Notification message shown when remote content is blocked

notification.showRemote.description: Button title to show remote content

notification.alwaysShowRemote.description: Button title to always show remote content.

action.editDraft.description: Edit draft button name in the message more menu

action.reply.description: Reply button name in the message more menu

action.replyAll.description: Reply all button name in the message more menu

action.replyList.description: Reply list button name in the message more menu

action.editNew.description: Edit as new button name in the message more menu

action.forward.description: Forward button name in the message more menu

message.fromHeader.description: Header name displayed for the from field

message.toHeader.description: Header name displayed for the to field

message.ccHeader.description: Header name displayed for the cc field

header.to.description: Used in the header, inserted in 'from me to you'.

tags.jumpToFolder.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the jump to folder tag.

tags.inFolder.description: Folder indication for the jump to folder tag.

attachments.downloadAll.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the download all attachments button.

attachments.gallery.tooltip.description: Tooltip for the view attachments in gallery button.

attachments.preview.tooltip.description: Tooltip displayed for the preview button of an attachment.

attachments.open.tooltip.description: Tooltip displayed for the preview button of an attachment.

attachments.viewAttachment.tooltip.message: Prikaži ovaj privitak u novoj kartici
attachments.viewAttachment.tooltip.description: Tooltip displayed for an attachment that can be previewed in a tab.

attachments.download.tooltip.description: Tooltip displayed for the download button of an attachment.

messageBody.hideQuotedText.description: String displayed in a message body to collapse the quoted text.

messageBody.showQuotedText.description: String displayed in a message body to expand the quoted text.

messageBody.hideSigText.description: String displayed in a message body to collapse the signature.

messageBody.showSigText.description: String displayed in a message body to expand the signature.

header.commaSeparator.description: This is used in messages, for the recipients, and the 'between' column as well. In English, space after the comma.

header.andSeparator.description: This is used in messages, for the recipients, and the 'between' column as well. In English, space after and before « and ».

attachments.context.detach.description: Context menu item to detach an attachment.

attachments.context.delete.description: Context menu item to delete an attachment.

pluralForm.description: Please make sure you read and understood https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Localization_and_Plurals. pluralForm corresponds to the 'pluralRule' variable that's described in the page, it's just a mistake if the name doesn't match the MDC page.

attachments.numAttachments.description: The description used for how many attachments there are. This should take the form of a plural form, see also 'pluralForm'.

message.meFromMeToSomeone.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meFromSomeoneToMe.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meBetweenMeAndSomeone.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.meBetweenSomeoneAndMe.description: One of four different strings are required to accomodate some languages which have specific declensions.

message.headerSubject.description: Name for the Subject header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

message.headerDate.description: Name for the Date header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

message.headerFolder.description: Name for the Folder header that is displayed when you click the show details button.

involvingTabTitle.description: This is used when we click on the "recent conversations" button in a contact tooltip. This is the title of the tab that opens.

compose.confirmDiscard.message: Jeste li sigurni da želite odbaciti ovu poruku?
compose.confirmDiscard.description: Confirmation message when discarding a compose draft.

compose.attachFiles.description: Title of the file picker to attach files to a compose draft.

compose.attachedMessage.description: The filename name to use for an attachment when attaching an email.

compose.attachment.description: Attachment header when composing a draft.

attachments.sizeUnknown.description: The message displayed when an attachment size is unknown.

compose.sendAnEmptyMessage.description: Confirmation message for sending an empty email.

compose.sendingMessage.description: Information text when sending an email.

compose.messageSendingSuccess.description: Information text for email sent success.

compose.couldntSendTheMessage.description: Information text for when sending email failed.

conversation.forwardFillInText.message: Mislim da će ti ovaj razgovor biti zanimljiv!
conversation.forwardFillInText.description: Text displayed when a conversation is forwarded.

compose.messageSendingCanceled.description: Information text when sending email was canceled.

enigmail.attachmentsNotEncrypted.message:
Privitci neće biti kriptirani koristeći umetnuti-PGP.
Umjesto toga poslati poruku koristeći PGP/MIME?
enigmail.attachmentsNotEncrypted.description: For the enigmail plugin to indicate attachments are not encrypted on sending.

compose.write.description: Document title for composing an email in a new tab.

between.columnName.description: The displayed name of the between column.

between.columnTooltip.description: The tooltip of the between column.

message.at.description: Used for concatenation of two strings, e.g. John Doe at http://bugzilla.mozilla.org

enigmail.messageSigned.description: Tag description displayed when a message is signed.

enigmail.messageSignedLong.description: Tooltip displayed when a signature is good and verified.

enigmail.messageDecrypted.description: Tag description displayed when a message has been decrypted.

enigmail.messageDecryptedLong.message: Ova poruka je dekodirana prije prikazivanja
enigmail.messageDecryptedLong.description: Tooltip displayed when a message has been decrypted.

dkimVerifier.messageDKIMSigned.description: Tag description displayed when a message is DKIM signed.

compose.addCc.description: Link to click to add a cc when composing messages.

compose.addBcc.description: Link to click to add bcc when composing messages.

compose.addAttachment.description: Link to add an attachment when composing messages.

compose.removeAttachment.description: Link to remove an attachment when composing messages.

compose.fieldBcc.description: Field name for the bcc field when composing messages.

compose.fieldSubject.description: Field name for the subject field when composing messages.

compose.editField.description: Link title to edit a particular field when composing messages.

compose.send.description: Button name to send a message.

compose.sendArchive.description: Button name to send and archive a message.

compose.save.description: Button name to save a message as draft.

compose.discard.description: Button name to discard a message draft.

compose.mostFrequentContacts.description: Field name for showing the most frequently used contacts.

compose.showMore.description: Show more link for showing more contacts.

enigmail.unknownGood.description: Tooltip displayed when a signature is good but unverified.

pdfViewer.loading.description: Description displayed when a pdf is loading.

pdfViewer.next.description: Description for the next page button.

pdfViewer.previous.description: Description for the previous page button.
